thread.title: Florida Sheriff's Office may be sued over deputy's inaction

title: Florida Sheriff's Office may be sued over deputy's inaction
text:
Florida Sheriff's Office may be sued over deputy's inaction Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 02:36 
The Sheriff’s Office in Broward County, Florida, could be sued over the failure of one of its deputies to enter a high school while a gunman was killing 17 people earlier this month, legal experts said.   
The Sheriff’s Office in Broward County, Florida, could be sued over the failure of one of its deputies to enter a high school while a gunman was killing 17 people earlier this month, legal experts said.  //reut.rs/2CP6vNK
